item.title: 中国正在全球寻找新的食品供应商
item.description:
为了应对贸易战和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的卷土重来，美国已经做出了巨大努力。【原文：

The country has made substantial efforts to future-proof itself for trade wars and the return of Donald Trump.

】

item.title: 交易商押注关税可能性增大，美国金属和石油大涨
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将对进口商品征收关税的押注，美国金属和石油价格飙升至高于国际同类产品的水平。【原文：US prices of metals and oil are surging above their international counterparts as traders increase bets President-elect Donald Trump will impose tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 债券交易员押注关键CPI数据公布后暴跌将有所缓解
item.description: 一些债券交易商打赌，国债的无情抛售将很快失去动力，部分原因是围绕当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策将如何成形的问题。【原文：Some bond traders are betting that the relentless selloff in Treasuries will soon lose momentum, in part because of questions around how President-elect Donald Trump’s policies will take shape.】

item.title: Sonos 首席产品官将离职，临时首席执行官将上任
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Sonos Inc.据一位知情人士透露，Sonos 首席产品官 Maxime Bouvat-Merlin 即将离开这家音频技术公司，此前该公司首席执行官也因应用程序改版失败而于周一离职。【原文：Sonos Inc. Chief Product Officer Maxime Bouvat-Merlin is leaving the audio technology company, following Monday’s exit of the chief executive officer amid the fallout from the failure of its app revamp, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 共和党人团结一致支持黑格塞斯，为其获得批准铺平道路
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的五角大楼领导人皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）在为期半天的参议院听证会后似乎有望赢得确认，尽管他因所谓的性格缺陷而遭到民主党人的严厉质询。【原文：Pete Hegseth, President-elect Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Pentagon, appeared on course to win confirmation after a half-day Senate hearing, even after he was hit with hard questions from Democrats over alleged character flaws.】

item.title: 英特尔将把风险投资部门独立出来，并启用新名称
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）是一家曾经占据主导地位的芯片制造商，正在努力重振其业务和财务状况，该公司计划将其风险投资部门转变为一个独立的基金，并启用新的名称。【原文：Intel Corp., the once-dominant chipmaker struggling to revive its business and finances, plans to turn its venture capital arm into a separate fund with a new name.】

item.title: CFTC 对 Crypto.com 超级碗合约进行审查，要求暂停交易
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）对在 Crypto.com 交易所交易的超级碗和其他与体育相关的衍生品合约进行了审查，以确定它们是否符合法律标准。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission put Super Bowl and other sports-related derivatives contracts traded on Crypto.com’s exchange under review to determine whether they meet legal standards.】

item.title: 政治动荡和飞机失事引发韩国央行降息预期
item.description: 普遍预计韩国央行本周将下调基准利率，暂时搁置对金融稳定性的担忧，集中精力支撑因政治动荡和致命空难而遭受重创的经济。【原文：The Bank of Korea is broadly expected to cut its benchmark interest rate this week, setting aside concerns about financial stability for now to focus on shoring up an economy battered by political turmoil and a deadly airline crash.】

item.title: 新泽西州州长墨菲加入禁止在学校使用手机的行列
item.description: 新泽西州州长菲尔-墨菲（Phil Murphy）成为最新一位呼吁在学校禁止使用手机的政府官员，他说手机会分散注意力，妨碍学习。【原文：New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy became the latest public official to call for banning mobile phones in schools, saying they’re a distraction that hinders learning.】

item.title: SGS 正与法国必维国际检验集团洽谈合并事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，SGS SA 正在与必维国际检验集团（Bureau Veritas SA）就合并事宜进行深入谈判。【原文：SGS SA is in advanced talks to combine with Bureau Veritas SA, people with knowledge of the matter said, in a deal that would create a European testing and certification company with a combined market value of almost $35 billion.】

item.title: 默茨将向达沃斯精英介绍德国大选竞选策略
item.description: 弗里德里希-梅尔茨是下月德国临时大选后竞选总理的领跑者，他将于下周在世界经济论坛上发表竞选演说。【原文：Friedrich Merz, the frontrunner to become chancellor after Germany’s snap election next month, will take his campaign pitch to the World Economic Forum next week.】

item.title: J&J公司的评级因细胞内收购而面临风险
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）是投资评级最高的公司之一，由于收购 Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc.【原文：Johnson & Johnson, one of the highest-rated investment-grade companies, is at risk of losing its AAA status at S&P Global Ratings due to its purchase of Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc.】

item.title: 彭氏娱乐激进分子 HG Vora 为代理权争夺战做准备
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚娱乐公司（Penn Entertainment Inc. 股东 HG Vora）将其在该赌场运营商中的持股比例削减至略低于 5%，以便在未获得所有必要的赌博许可证的情况下发起代理权争夺战。【原文：Penn Entertainment Inc. stockholder HG Vora trimmed its holdings in the casino operator to just under 5% so it can launch a proxy fight without obtaining all of the required gambling licenses.】

item.title: 乌拉圭 DLocal 首席执行官寻求收购，否认金融科技正在出售
item.description: 支付服务提供商 DLocal Ltd. 首席执行官佩德罗-阿恩特（Pedro Arnt）周一在接受采访时说，在公司本身成为收购提案的目标之后，该公司正在分析是否在今年收购一家规模较小的金融科技竞争对手。【原文：Payment services provider DLocal Ltd. is analyzing whether to buy a smaller fintech rival this year after the company itself was the target of takeover proposals, Chief Executive Officer Pedro Arnt said in an interview Monday.】

item.title: EIA 称，随着欧佩克（OPEC）产量回升，2026 年石油短缺将扩大
item.description: 美国政府在其对明年的第一套预测中表示，随着欧佩克（OPEC）产量的回升以及美国、加拿大和圭亚那产量的持续增长，2026年全球石油市场将面临日益严重的供应过剩问题。【原文：Global oil markets will face a widening glut in 2026 as OPEC brings back production and output from the US, Canada and Guyana continues to grow, the US government said in its first set of forecasts for next year.】

item.title: 芝加哥酝酿就削弱欢迎城市规则的修正案进行表决
item.description: 在距离当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职不到一周的时间里，一名芝加哥市议员正在推动一项措施，以缩减其庇护城市的规定。【原文：A Chicago city council member is pushing a measure that would scale back its sanctuary city rules, less than a week before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀保持平静，为外汇政策变革打开大门
item.description: 12 月份，阿根廷的月通胀率继续接近四年来的低点，这为哈维尔-米莱总统一年多来首次改变货币政策打开了大门。【原文：Argentina’s monthly inflation continued to run near a four-year low in December, opening the door for President Javier Milei to make his first change to currency policy in more than a year.】

item.title: 私人信贷繁荣背后的力量
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 高盛主导的 Proofpoint 交易帮助了饥渴的债务投资者
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s financing for Proofpoint Inc. is a small drop of water into the mouths of thirsty investors.】

item.title: 加密货币期权交易场所 Deribit 引发买家兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球最大的比特币和以太币期权交易平台Deribit已经引起了潜在收购方的兴趣，并正在与一家财务顾问公司合作审查收购机会。【原文：Deribit, the world’s largest trading platform for Bitcoin and Ether options, has drawn interest from potential acquirers and is working with a financial adviser to review opportunities, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 收益率飙升波及公司债券，导致销售延迟
item.description: 收益率飙升正促使至少几家蓝筹公司推迟出售美国债券，这表明国债价格下跌正波及其他市场。【原文：Surging yields are spurring at least a few blue-chip companies to delay US bond sales, a sign of how falling Treasury prices are rippling into other markets.】

item.title: Cellnex 将在 2025 年回购高达 8 亿欧元的股票
item.description: Cellnex Telecom SA 表示，将在今年年底前回购多达 8 亿欧元（约合 8.23 亿美元）的股票，在这家西班牙铁塔公司计划于 2026 年推出股息之前。【原文：Cellnex Telecom SA said it will repurchase as much as €800 million ($823 million) in shares by the end of the year, ahead of the Spanish tower company’s plan to roll out a dividend in 2026.】

item.title: S&P 将洛杉矶公共事业债券评级下调两级
item.description: S&P 全球评级公司周二下调了洛杉矶水电部出售的市政债券的评级，将该公司电力系统债券的评级从 AA- 下调两级至 A。【原文：S&P Global Ratings on Tuesday lowered the rating on municipal bonds sold by Los Angeles Department of Water and Power, downgrading the utility’s power system bonds by two notches to A from AA-.】

item.title: 卡尼与弗里兰争夺最高职位，加拿大部长选择退出
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）接任加拿大总理一职的竞争越来越像是前财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）和前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）之间的双向选择。【原文：The race to succeed Justin Trudeau as Canada’s prime minister is increasingly looking like a two-way battle between former Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland and ex-central banker Mark Carney.】

item.title: 对冲基金 SPX Capital 从低迷中反弹，击败巴西同行
item.description: 巴西对冲基金经理罗杰里奥-泽维尔（Rogerio Xavier）在首次出现年度亏损一年后，卷土重来。【原文：A year after posting his first ever annual loss, Brazilian hedge fund manager Rogerio Xavier pulled off a comeback.】

item.title: Venture Global引领美国能源IPO从二十年低点反弹
item.description: 在经历了 2003 年以来最糟糕的一年之后，能源行业将在美国首次公开募股市场卷土重来，大宗交易如雨后春笋般涌现。【原文：The energy industry is set to stage a comeback in the US initial public offerings market, with sizable deals springing up after the worst year since 2003.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与阿联酋商谈将铁路延伸至乌干达和南苏丹
item.description: 肯尼亚说，它正在与阿联酋商谈扩建一条通往乌干达和南苏丹的铁路线。【原文：Kenya said it is in talks with the UAE to expand a railway line to Uganda and South Sudan.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州公布 80 亿美元公共交通资助计划
item.description: 马萨诸塞州官员正计划注资 80 亿美元，用于推进该州老化道路、桥梁和公共交通的改善项目。【原文：Massachusetts officials are planning to inject $8 billion into advancing improvement projects for the state’s aging roads, bridges and public transit.】

item.title: 殖民地公司关闭美国最大汽油管道调查泄漏事件
item.description: 殖民管道公司（Colonial Pipeline Co.【原文：Colonial Pipeline Co. shut the largest US fuel pipeline Tuesday to investigate a potential leak in Georgia.】

item.title: 爱尔兰时报》称爱尔兰主要政党达成政府协议
item.description: 据《爱尔兰时报》（Irish Times）报道，经过数周的谈判，爱尔兰的中间派政党达成了组建联合政府的协议，并得到了少数不结盟议员的支持。【原文：Ireland’s centrist political parties struck a deal to form a coalition government, backed by a handful of unaligned lawmakers, after weeks of negotiations, according to the Irish Times.】
